tei:classSpec.tei:desc: This attribute class provides attribute name.

tei:attDef.tei:desc: This attribute should be used to specify a name identifier for the element.

tei:remarks.tei:p: As opposed to attribute xml:id there can be multiple occurences of the same name in the document. Some styleDef elements from different domains (e.g. tempo, dynamics and articulation) may use the same name to indicate affiliation. Different styleDef elements within the same domain may contain elements with the same name, e.g. two tempoDef elements may associate different numeric tempi with the same name (say Allegro).
